blocks.content:
Congratulations on completing this journey! Job well done!

We hope you've enjoyed traveling with us as you:

- Navigated to Traces Drilldown and viewed the distribution of trace span durations
- Identified and reviewed the details of the slowest traces
- Viewed the details of a trace span to identify the root cause of latency

**More to explore (optional)**

The world is your oyster! Read more about how you can:

- [Investigate trends and spikes](/docs/grafana-cloud/visualizations/simplified-exploration/traces/investigate/)
- [Identify bottlenecks and establish SLOs](/docs/grafana-cloud/visualizations/simplified-exploration/traces/concepts/solutions-with-traces/traces-app-insights/)
- [Diagnose errors with traces](/docs/grafana-cloud/visualizations/simplified-exploration/traces/concepts/solutions-with-traces/traces-diagnose-errors/)
- [Traces in Explore](/docs/grafana-cloud/visualizations/explore/trace-integration/)
- [Explore data using Metrics Drilldown](/docs/learning-paths/drilldown-metrics/)

**Related paths**

Consider taking the following paths after you complete this journey:

- [Visualize traces in a Grafana Cloud dashboard](/docs/learning-paths/visualization-traces/)
